note.p: Career: Appointed Viceroy of Norway, 1813, and driven out of Norway when he refused to consent to the unionof Norwy and Sweden, living in retirement 1815-1831. Member of the Council of State (1831-1839); opposed liberal projects and intryinig to appease the Germans in Schleswig Holstein he helpted bring bout the war of 1848.
